jp_text: そ それは…

en_text: Baths really are the best.
jp_text: やっぱりお風呂最高
google_translated: After all the bath is the best

en_text: I agree.
jp_text: 同意なのです

en_text: You've done a lot for Haku, I think.
jp_text: 気にしないで欲しいのです

en_text: Don't worry about it.
jp_text: ですね

en_text: This murky water is so good for your skin.
jp_text:
うんうん このにごり湯って
お肌にいいのよねー
google_translated:
Yeah, this guy
Good for your skin

en_text: I just happened to study it once.
jp_text: たまたま勉強したことあるだけです

en_text: Some nice cold milk, for instance?
jp_text: 冷たい乳をぐっとね

en_text: Gulp it right down!
jp_text: そちらこそなのです

en_text: You know how it works, I see!
jp_text: フフン 分かってるねー

en_text: I hate to admit that he's \Nthe one who taught it to me,
jp_text: あの人に教えられたと思うと癪ですが
google_translated: I think that person was taught to that person

en_text: Of course, I think!
jp_text: あ もちろんかな

en_text: Come inside.
jp_text: ２人とも よく戻りましたね

en_text: You're certain that you've found him?
jp_text:
見つけた という知らせに
間違いありませんか？
google_translated:
In the news that I found
Is it correct?

en_text: My lord, finally... Finally...
jp_text: 我が君 やっと

en_text: It's been so long.
jp_text: 形変えては繰り返される 夢か現か
google_translated: A dream or present if it is repeated

en_text: How long have I waited for this day?
jp_text: 長かった　この時をどれだけ待ち望んだか
google_translated: How long did you want to wait at this time?

en_text: It must be by the grace of Heaven that \Nhe has appeared before my life ends.
jp_text:
我が命尽き果てる前に現れるとは
まさしく天啓というもの
google_translated:
When I appear before my life
It is a great deal

en_text: Episode 5\NThe Pirate Girl
jp_text: う
